OrgName.entry: BRITISH RED CROSS TRANSPORT AND ESCORT

Desc.entry: A registered charity that helps people in need in the Yorkshire area to access transport. The transport service offers freedom and independence for people who cannot get around easily or use public transport. Provides volunteer car drivers or a society minibus to take groups or wheelchair users. A charge is made for the service based on mileage. Helps people to get to health appointments such as doctors, visit family and friends and provides support with transport needs for holidays.
